movie.title: Her Only Choice
movie.description_intro: A woman is faced with a choice to fight for her life or sacrifice it for another. After years of infertility, a newly-expectant mother is diagnosed with a life-altering disease.
movie.description_full: A woman is faced with a choice to fight for her life or sacrifice it for another. After years of infertility, a newly-expectant mother is diagnosed with a life-altering disease.

movies.title: Atonement
movies.summary: When Briony Tallis (Saoirse Ronan), thirteen-years-old and an aspiring writer, sees her older sister Cecilia (Keira Knightley) and Robbie Turner (James McAvoy) at the fountain in front of the family estate, she misinterprets what is happening, thus setting into motion a series of misunderstandings and a childish pique that will have lasting repercussions for all of them. Robbie is the son of a family servant toward whom the family has always been kind. They paid for his time at Cambridge and now he plans on going to medical school. After the fountain incident, Briony reads a letter intended for Cecilia and concludes that Robbie is a deviant. When her cousin Lola (Juno Temple) is raped, she tells the Police that it was Robbie she saw committing the deed.

movies.title: Undercover Cheerleader
movies.summary: Autumn goes undercover as a cheerleader to report on the toxic culture of cheerleading for her high school newspaper. As the articles come out, cheerleaders start getting picked off one by one, as someone is determined to shut down the expose. Autumn must find the attacker before she herself is discovered and killed.
movies.description_full: Autumn goes undercover as a cheerleader to report on the toxic culture of cheerleading for her high school newspaper. As the articles come out, cheerleaders start getting picked off one by one, as someone is determined to shut down the expose. Autumn must find the attacker before she herself is discovered and killed.

movies.title: Stranger from Canton
movies.summary: Japan has already occupied Korea and now China. Chin, a young woman understands that the Motherland demands all her children to be brave, and sacrifice their lives for the liberation. Disguised as a prostitute, she will board a train to help a Chinese guerrilla group defeat a Japanese army convoy.
movies.description_full: Japan has already occupied Korea and now China. Chin, a young woman understands that the Motherland demands all her children to be brave, and sacrifice their lives for the liberation. Disguised as a prostitute, she will board a train to help a Chinese guerrilla group defeat a Japanese army convoy.

movies.title: Tapeworm
movies.summary: A hypochondriac, a failed comedian, a loner and two naive stoners seek an escape from their pitiful and mundane existence.
movies.description_full: A hypochondriac, a failed comedian, a loner and two naive stoners seek an escape from their pitiful and mundane existence.
movies.synopsis: A hypochondriac, a failed comedian, a loner and two naive stoners seek an escape from their pitiful and mundane existence.
